extendedInfo.description: Disco Slot Machines has 5 reels and 20 winning paylines. There are two Free Spins Modes and also a Dance Floor Wild Feature and players can win up to 230,000.00 coins from this 70s disco-style pokies game. These slot machines are accompanied by some fantastic background audio and impressive sound effects.The Wild Symbols on these pokies substitute all symbols on the reels, apart from the Scatter Symbols. The Scatter Symbols in these exciting slot machines are the shiny Disco Ball Symbols and the Dance Floor Wild feature works as follows:With every spin you take in this pokies game 15 dance floor tiles will appear on the reels with a random coloured pattern, which basically covers every position on the reels. When the colour of the dance floor tile happens to match the colour of the disco dancer that lands on top of that tile, that disco dancer symbol will then automatically become a Wild Symbol, generating additional line wins.This sounds more difficult to understand than it actually is and if you want to find out more detailsabout that pokies feature, open the paytable as soon as you launch these slot machines.When three or more of the Scatter Symbols appear in view of these pokies, the Free Spins bonus round is activated. You can then choose one of two different Free Spins modes, which include the Disco Spins or the Free Spins.Choosing Disco Spins will award you 10 Free Spins where only Disco Dancer Symbols and Scatter Symbols will appear on the reels. Choosing Free Spins will award 15 Free Spins with a 3X Multiplier. Both Free Spins bonus rounds CAN be retriggered when playing Disco Slot Machines.
